title.value: FHIR Connectathon 21 - Terminology Services - CodeSystem Validate Code - LOINC - OK - GET - XML

description.value: CodeSystem $validate-code tests against known LOINC codes where the expected outcome is a successful response and a valid Parameters payload with a result true value. All $validate-code operations are performed using the FHIR Operation Framework HTTP GET method.

Validate code test for LOINC code system using HTTP GET with code='11378-7' and display='Systolic blood pressure at First encounter'. Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the result value true.
Test $validate-code operation on the LOINC code system for a valid code and display.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters minimally contains the information in validate-code-valid-min.
